body: State variables; time-domain and frequency-domain design and analysis; design of feedback control systems; Root Locus.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: MATH 220 ; E E 350 or E E 312)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 380: Introduction to Linear Control Systems
